name: caladyn
description: Caladyn is a mystical location set in a photorealistic Arabian Nights-inspired desert high fantasy. This enchanting desert environment is characterized by vast, golden dunes, ancient architecture, and a magical atmosphere filled with shimmering heat and a sense of wonder.

objects.name: Golden Dune
objects.description: A large, sweeping sand dune with a golden hue, shaped by the desert winds.
objects.prompt: A large, isolated sand dune with a golden hue, centered in frame on a fully transparent background. The dune should have gentle, flowing curves, capturing the softness of desert sands.
objects.placement_notes: Place dunes sporadically across the landscape to create a natural desert terrain.

objects.name: Ancient Ruins
objects.description: Remains of an ancient stone structure, featuring ornate carvings and partially crumbled walls.
objects.prompt: A segment of ancient stone ruins, featuring intricate carvings and partially crumbled walls, centered in frame on a fully transparent background.
objects.placement_notes: Scatter ruins around the location to suggest a once-thriving civilization.

objects.name: Oasis
objects.description: A small, lush oasis with palm trees and a clear, reflective pond.
objects.prompt: A small oasis with several palm trees and a clear, reflective pond, centered in frame on a fully transparent background.
objects.placement_notes: Position the oasis in a central location to serve as a focal point for the environment.

objects.name: Desert Rock
objects.description: A large, weathered rock formation commonly found in desert landscapes.
objects.prompt: A large, isolated desert rock formation with a weathered appearance, centered in frame on a fully transparent background.
objects.placement_notes: Place rocks sporadically to add variety to the desert terrain.

objects.name: Arabian Archway
objects.description: An ornate stone archway with intricate patterns, typical of Arabian architecture.
objects.prompt: An ornate stone archway with intricate Arabian patterns, centered in frame on a fully transparent background.
objects.placement_notes: Position archways near ruins or as standalone structures for visual interest.

objects.name: Desert Ground Texture
objects.description: A high-resolution texture of desert sand with subtle wind patterns.
objects.prompt: A high-resolution texture capturing the fine details of desert sand with subtle wind patterns, designed for seamless tiling.
objects.placement_notes: Apply this texture to the landscape to create the sandy ground surface.

objects.name: Oasis Water Texture
objects.description: A texture of clear, reflective water suitable for an oasis pond.
objects.prompt: A clear, reflective water texture for use in an oasis pond, capturing the essence of tranquility and freshness.
objects.placement_notes: Use this texture for the water surface in the oasis.

objects.name: Whispering Wind Audio
objects.description: An ambient audio track of soft desert winds gently blowing across sand dunes.
objects.prompt: An ambient audio recording of soft desert winds, capturing the gentle, continuous sound of wind blowing across sand dunes.
objects.placement_notes: Play this audio throughout the environment to enhance the desert atmosphere.

objects.name: Cicada Chorus Audio
objects.description: A soundscape of cicadas chirping, common in hot desert environments.
objects.prompt: A soundscape of cicadas chirping, providing a rhythmic and ambient background typical of hot desert environments.
objects.placement_notes: Layer this audio with the wind to add depth to the environmental soundscape.
